title: Fall Worship Night
summary: An intimate evening of worship featuring new arrangements and testimonies from the road in Indianapolis.
description: Join DJ Lee & The Voices of Judah for an immersive night of praise as we unveil new music and testimonies from this season's ministry tour. Expect a full choir, live band, and special guest psalmists from the Indianapolis region.
priceSummary: Group bundles available for ministries of 10 or more.

faq.question: Are seats reserved?
faq.answer: All tickets are general admission. Doors open at 6:00 PM and seating is first come, first served.

faq.question: Will childcare be provided?
faq.answer: Yes. A supervised kids worship lab is available for ages 4–10; register during checkout so we can plan volunteers.

title: 12th Anniversary Reunion Concert
summary: Celebrate 12 years of ministry with a full choir reunion, live band, and special alumni features in Chicago.
description: We’re inviting every past and present member of DJ Lee & The Voices of Judah back to the stage for one unforgettable night of praise. Expect new arrangements of the classics, a live string section, and an extended altar ministry moment.
priceSummary: VIP meet & greet packages include reserved seating and signed merch.

faq.question: What time do doors open?
faq.answer: Doors open at 5:00 PM with a pre-show fellowship lounge. VIP guests may check in starting at 4:30 PM.

faq.question: Is parking available on site?
faq.answer: Complimentary parking is available in the main lot. Overflow parking with shuttle service is available from the 115th Street commuter lot.

title: New Year Praise Revival
summary: Launch 2026 with a high-energy revival night featuring DJ Lee & The Voices of Judah and guest worship leaders from Atlanta.
description: We’re starting the new year with a declaration of victory in Atlanta. Experience prophetic worship, mass choir collaborations, and a midnight communion moment as we dedicate 2026 to the Lord.
priceSummary: VIP includes early entry, reserved front-row seating, and post-service photo opportunity.

faq.question: Will there be a livestream?
faq.answer: Yes. A pay-per-view livestream will be available worldwide; details will be emailed to registered guests.

faq.question: Can youth participate?
faq.answer: Absolutely. Our youth choir will open the night, and a student discount is available with valid ID.
